name: Seal
headline: All-in-one workspace for companies making regulated products

raw_markdown="![Seal Logo](https://seal.run/_next/static/media/nav-logo.a0b155af.svg)

# The execution system for life-science
GxP ready platform
Best-practice blueprints
Extensible with AI
Request demo
[Get started](https://seal.run/</signup?system=home>)
Seal, please digitize our sample workflow...
![Seal, please digitize our sample workflow...](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2Fscreenshots%2Fmain.png&w=3840&q=75)
Seal, what caused the out-of-spec samples?
![Seal, what caused the out-of-spec samples?](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2Fscreenshots%2Fcomputed-view-screenshot.png&w=3840&q=75)
Join the startups and FTSE500s elevating their GxP operations on Seal

## Deployed systems that you can evolve
Select cloud systems and get them setup for you with best-practice from hundreds of deployments adapted to fit you perfectly. Evolve as your processes improve and scale.
[qmsQuality Management SystemThe complete QMS System with integrated validation![Quality Management System illustration](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FSOP.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://seal.run/</systems/qms>)[limsLab Information Management SystemTrack samples, manage data, and ensure compliance with ease![Lab Information Management System illustration](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FScreenshot%202025-01-13%20at%2010.07.49%201.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://seal.run/</systems/lims>)[elnElectronic Laboratory NotebookCapture and streamline all your lab data effortlessly![Electronic Laboratory Notebook illustration](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FELN.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://seal.run/</systems/eln>)[ebrElectronic Batch RecordsEffortlessly automate, track, and manage all your batch records across workflows![Electronic Batch Records illustration](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2Fbatchrecordui.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://seal.run/</systems/ebr>)[pdsProcess Development SystemAccelerate innovation by seamlessly designing and scaling processes![Process Development System illustration](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2Fpd.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://seal.run/</systems/pds>)
## Best-practice blueprints you can install
Digitize GxP operations in minutes with pre-built blueprints. Install best practices developed with leading life-science companies and ensure compliance. [See all blueprints ](https://seal.run/</templates>)
[![CAPA Creation](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FScreen%20Shot%202024-11-27%20at%204.14.29%20PM.png&w=3840&q=85)CAPA Creation](https://seal.run/</blueprints/CAPA-Creation>)[![COSHH Regulation](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FScreen%20Shot%202024-11-27%20at%204.24.14%20PM.png&w=3840&q=85)COSHH Regulation](https://seal.run/</blueprints/COSHH-Regulation>)[![CQA Dashboard Tracker](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2Fdashboard.png&w=3840&q=85)CQA Dashboard Tracker](https://seal.run/</blueprints/CQA-Dashboard-Tracker>)[![Change Control Forms](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FScreen%20Shot%202024-11-27%20at%204.17.02%20PM.png&w=3840&q=85)Change Control Forms](https://seal.run/</blueprints/Change-Control-Forms>)
## Life-scientists expediting on Seal
Join the scientists, engineers, technicians, quality professionals and data-scientists rapidly integrating, scaling, and automating their processes with confidence on Seal.
![Alex McVey](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FAlex%20McVey.png&w=128&q=75)
### Alex McVey
CEO at OGI Bio
We're delighted by Seal streamlining our quality and development processes!
![Ian Fotheringham MBE](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2Fian-f.webp&w=128&q=75)
### Ian Fotheringham MBE
CEO at Ingenza
We have been delighted with the rigour and agility shown by Seal in providing Ingenza with a robust eQMS that fully supports our process development and biomanufacturing operations.
![Jennie Yang](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FJennie%20Yang.jpeg&w=128&q=75)
### Jennie Yang
R&D and QA Lead at IMU Biosciences
Seal is incorporated into our daily workflow to firstly help us with various areas of lab operation documentation; to increase efficiency, improve quality...a massive step towards lab accreditation!
![Mads Asbild](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FMads%20Asbild.jpeg&w=128&q=75)
### Mads Asbild
CCO at Nordic Microbes
We are very pleased with the opportunities Seal provides us in terms of daily efficiency in our processes
![Matt Brown](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FMatt%20Brown.jpeg&w=128&q=75)
### Matt Brown
Quality Manager at Nexterra Wine
We're finally able to capture all quality data in one database, so we can keep a closer eye on our wine quality!
![Nicola Barnes](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FNicole%20Barnes.jpeg&w=128&q=75)
### Nicola Barnes
Head of Quality at Ingenza
We can now easily share data and documents internally ‚Äì with full control over access and editing!
![Scott Parker](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FScott%20Parker.jpeg&w=128&q=75)
### Scott Parker
Quality Systems Manager at MiAlgae
Seal is allowing us to greatly streamline our QMS and improve our overall workflow efficiency and data handling
![Thibaut De Coninck](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2Fthibaut.jpeg&w=128&q=75)
### Thibaut De Coninck
Production Manager at Revyve
Seal software has been a game-changer in preparing for our FSSC certification
![Victor Hill](https://seal.run/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.tina.io%2F382bcce5-0b28-4c7b-a2b6-ce532b457d3d%2FVictor%20Hill%20.jpeg&w=128&q=75)
### Victor Hill
Director of Quality at Quality Wellness
Going paperless with Seal has made things a lot more streamline. I no longer have to go through 15 different logbooks to find the information I‚Äôm looking for!
## Ready to try seal?
Seal makes it easy to put procedures on autopilot. Take control. Automate repetitive work. Ensure compliance. Improve continuously.
Request demo
[Get started](https://seal.run/</signup?system=home>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27140%27%20height=%2745%27/%3e)![G2 Rating](https://seal.run)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2760%27%20height=%2770%27/%3e)![G2 Rating winter24](https://seal.run)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2760%27%20height=%2770%27/%3e)![G2 Rating fall23](https://seal.run)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Seal**

**Website:** [seal.run](https://seal.run)  
**Founded:** 2019  
**Location:** London, United Kingdom  
**Employees:** 22  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S20  
**Group Partner:** Harj Taggar  
**Industry Tag:** Documents  

### Mission
Seal aims to be the all-in-one workspace for companies developing regulated products. They are focused on digitizing and streamlining operations in life sciences that adhere to compliance standards‚Äîcommonly referred to as GxP (Good Practice).

### Core Offerings
Seal provides a comprehensive platform designed to ease the development and management of regulated workflows through the following key features:

- **GxP Ready Platform:** Tailored tools and systems that meet strict compliance requirements, ensuring that life sciences companies can operate efficiently and remain within legal margins.
  
- **Deployed Systems:** Customizable cloud systems to facilitate rapid setup and adaptation based on proven best practices. Seal offers various tools, such as:
  - **Quality Management System (QMS)**
  - **Lab Information Management System (LIMS)**
  - **Electronic Laboratory Notebook (ELN)**
  - **Electronic Batch Records (EBR)**
  - **Process Development System (PDS)**

- **Pre-Built Blueprints:** Users can quickly digitize processes with customizable blueprints reflecting industry best practices, which aids in ensuring compliance.

### Target Audience
